data.eml:eml: Taxonomic review of the lac insect genus Paratachardina Balachowsky (Hemiptera: Coccoidea: Kerriidae), with a revised key to genera of Kerriidae and description of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kondo, Takumasa, Gullan, Penny J. (2007): Taxonomic review of the lac insect genus Paratachardina Balachowsky (Hemiptera: Coccoidea: Kerriidae), with a revised key to genera of Kerriidae and description of two new species. Zootaxa 1617: 1-41, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179122
